prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon with a sleek body and a wise expression.
Imagine a Pokemon that uses telekinesis to battle in various terrains.
Generate a bipedal Pokemon that exudes intelligence and elegance in its design.
Design an evolved Pokemon that can manipulate objects with its mind and has a mystical aura.
Show me a Pokemon with golden hues and a strikingly intelligent gaze.
Give me a concept for a psychic Pokemon that excels in strategy and mind games.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of wisdom and mental prowess.
